content:
/>
IX.iii.1.l.3.y
.
Payments Under the CARES Act of 2020
Do not count any payments received from the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act of 2020.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
